title: Ticket #7215: Improve formatstr() performance
description: The formatstr() and formatstr_cat() functions have some room for improvement. formatstr_cat() does an unnecessary copy. And both can provide the length of the buffer to copied into the std::string, rather than requiring the std::string to calculate it for itself.
